snippet: Mr. Hope, a producer whose credits include "American Splendor" and "The Ice Storm," will be leaving New York to assume his new post on Sept. 1, the film society announced this week.
abstract: Mr. Hope, a producer whose credits include "American Splendor" and "The Ice Storm," will be leaving New York to assume his new post on Sept. 1, the film society announced this week.

headline.main: Another New York Transplant, Ted Hope, to Lead San Francisco Film Society
